description:
A personal injury can take a toll on all aspects of your life, and not just your physical health. The team at Gilbert Law Firm in Moses Lake, Washington, aggressively advocates on behalf of victims and their families for the compensation they need to recover physically, emotionally and financially after an accident. Attorneys William A. Gilbert and Ashley A. Richards take a personalized approach and use techniques developed over countless years to work toward the best possible outcome on clients' behalves.

The law firm is highly dedicated to improving the lives of those who fell victim to another person's or entity's negligence. It is prepared to handle cases involving a variety of types of injuries, ranging from the simple to the complex:

  • Animal bites
  • Birth injuries
  • Brain injuries
  • Car accidents
  • Medical malpractice
  • Trucking accidents
  • Wrongful death

If your harms involve discrimination, harassment, wrongful termination or other wrongful doings in the workplace, Mr. Gilbert and Ms. Richards possess the employment law experience to pursue justice in this area as well.

The Gilbert Law Firm takes a client-centric approach to representation. Mr. Gilbert shares this approach as a teacher at the Trial Lawyer's College and has helped hundreds of attorneys become the authentic advocates all injured or wronged parties deserve. Mr. Gilbert routinely receives requests for trial assistance from colleagues in Idaho, Washington and throughout the nation. Ms. Richards shares the same focus and passion for her clients as Mr. Gilbert. The firm offers free consultations and accepts credit cards as payment.
